channel.title: Merge on GC is Online
channel.description: Recent content in Merge on GC is Online

item.title: Merge two table
item.description: The question is how to merge two tables, it is easy to use merge. However, it is not easy to merge because the two table have different sample sizes and we want to keep all of them. Table 1: Some names not in table 2 name plot1 name_u 1 name_v 2 name_d 3 name_g 4 name_o 5 name_y 6 name_j 7 name_a 8 name_e 9 name_x 10 name_w 11 name_h 12 name_s 13 name_z 14 name_p 15 Table 1: Some names not in table 1 name plot2 name_n 1 name_v 2 name_g 3 name_y 4 name_w 5 name_f 6 name_u 7 name_o 8 name_t 9 name_i 10 Now we have problems, some names exist in table 1 but not in table 2, and vice verse.
